title: New: Blooms – Love
body:
**Blooms** aka Louise Cunnane released her fantastic debut EP last year, and has now returned with her most complete offering to date in the form of _Love_.

Combining a real All Saints-esque chorus, with production from P\*nut & Gil Lewis, all centred around a London Grammar style hook, it’s an intoxicating listen. Check it out below.

Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
